review_text:
Exterior: Very very aggressive and futurist look appealing from all angles. Paint quality is excellent . even after 12 years the shine is better than any local car.
Interior: Once you are inside the car its like a cock pit with the quietest cabin. leather seats & interior, leg space, steering position distance, road visual , seat height lumbar support etc all just remarkable and premium feel.
Fuel economy: very good for a 1800 cc car with climate control
Ride quality handling: just fabulous no other words
Final words: If GM motors had remained in Pakistan then it would have been cruze cruze every where. I have this car for the last 3 plus years . I'm really finding it difficult to find a replacement car at this price.
helpful_votes: (1 out of 1 person found this review helpful)

reviewer_info: Posted by Zafar Ali Mehdi on Mar 13, 2011
review_text: A very beautifull car, and if it will be launched in Pakistan its surelly gonna wipe out honda and toyota cars. the design and comfort are in top and i am writting all this because i have tried the car in danmark. its just too good. very good than corolla and civic or city.
